title: Kabir Singh
cast: Shahid Kapoor, Kiara Advani, Arjan Bajwa, Suresh Oberoi
description: A brilliant but short-tempered medical student goes on a path of self-destruction after his girlfriend is forced to marry someone else.

title: Bharat
cast: Salman Khan, Katrina Kaif, Sunil Grover, Disha Patani, Jackie Shroff
description: The journey of a man and a nation together. The film traces India's post-independence history from the perspective of a common man.

title: De De Pyaar De
cast: Ajay Devgn, Tabu, Rakul Preet Singh, Jimmy Sheirgill
description: A 50-year-old man falls in love with a 26-year-old woman. Their relationship is put to the test when he takes her to meet his ex-wife and his family.

title: Student of the Year 2
cast: Tiger Shroff, Tara Sutaria, Ananya Panday, Aditya Seal
description: A college student's life is turned upside down when he is thrown out of his school. He must now fight to win the 'Student of the Year' competition and reclaim his dignity.

title: Kalank
cast: Varun Dhawan, Alia Bhatt, Sanjay Dutt, Madhuri Dixit, Sonakshi Sinha, Aditya Roy Kapur
description: Set in pre-independence India, the film explores the complex relationships and hidden truths of six characters from a wealthy family in the city of Husnabad.

title: Kesari
cast: Akshay Kumar, Parineeti Chopra, Mir Sarwar
listed_in: Action & Adventure, Historical Movies, War Movies
description: Based on the historic Battle of Saragarhi, in which an army of 21 Sikhs fought against 10,000 Afghans in 1897.

title: Luka Chuppi
cast: Kartik Aaryan, Kriti Sanon, Aparshakti Khurana, Pankaj Tripathi
description: A television reporter in Mathura falls in love with a headstrong woman. They decide to try a live-in relationship, but their plan goes awry when their families get involved.

title: Total Dhamaal
cast: Ajay Devgn, Anil Kapoor, Madhuri Dixit, Riteish Deshmukh, Arshad Warsi, Javed Jaffrey, Sanjay Mishra
description: A group of eccentric characters race against each other to find a hidden treasure of 50 crore rupees. A wild and chaotic adventure ensues.

title: Manikarnika: The Queen of Jhansi
cast: Radha Krishna Jagarlamudi
country: Kangana Ranaut, Jisshu Sengupta, Atul Kulkarni, Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub
description: Action & Adventure, Biographical Dramas, War Movies
column12: The story of Rani Lakshmibai of Jhansi, one of the leading figures of the Indian Rebellion of 1857 and a symbol of resistance to the British Raj.

title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
cast: Vicky Kaushal, Paresh Rawal, Yami Gautam, Mohit Raina
description: Based on the true story of the 2016 surgical strikes conducted by the Indian Army in retaliation to the Uri attack. The film follows the special forces team that carried out the mission.

title: Zero
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma, Katrina Kaif, Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub
description: A vertically challenged man from a small town dreams of dating a superstar. His life takes an unexpected turn when he gets a chance to meet her.

title: Kedarnath
cast: Sushant Singh Rajput, Sara Ali Khan, Nitish Bharadwaj
description: A Hindu pilgrim and a Muslim porter fall in love during a pilgrimage to the holy town of Kedarnath. Their love is put to the test by the devastating floods that struck the region in 2013.

cast: Rajinikanth, Akshay Kumar, Amy Jackson
description: An ornithologist who is driven to suicide returns as a vengeful spirit, targeting mobile phone users. A scientist must reactivate his robotic creation, Chitti, to stop him.

title: Thugs of Hindostan
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Aamir Khan, Katrina Kaif, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Lloyd Owen
description: In 1795, a band of thugs led by a fierce warrior poses a serious challenge to the British East India Company. The British hire a small-time thug to infiltrate the group and bring them down.

title: Loveyatri
cast: Aayush Sharma, Warina Hussain, Ronit Roy, Ram Kapoor
description: A happy-go-lucky boy from Vadodara falls in love with a bright young NRI girl who visits his town during the Navratri festival. He follows her to the UK to win her heart.

title: Sui Dhaaga
cast: Varun Dhawan, Anushka Sharma, Raghubir Yadav
description: A young man from a small town decides to start his own tailoring business with his wife's support. The film celebrates the spirit of entrepreneurship and self-reliance.

title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
cast: Shahid Kapoor, Shraddha Kapoor, Divyendu Sharma, Yami Gautam
description: A lawyer takes on a powerful electricity company after his friend commits suicide due to an inflated electricity bill. The film highlights the issue of power theft and faulty billing.

title: Manmarziyaan
cast: Abhishek Bachchan, Taapsee Pannu, Vicky Kaushal
description: A spirited young woman is caught in a love triangle between her commitment-phobic boyfriend and a responsible NRI man who wants to marry her.

title: Gold
cast: Akshay Kumar, Mouni Roy, Kunal Kapoor, Amit Sadh, Vineet Kumar Singh, Sunny Kaushal
description: The true story of the Indian hockey team's journey to win the first Olympic gold medal for an independent India at the 1948 Olympics in London.

title: Satyameva Jayate
cast: John Abraham, Manoj Bajpayee, Aisha Sharma, Amruta Khanvilkar
description: A vigilante goes on a killing spree, targeting corrupt police officers. An honest cop is tasked with stopping him, leading to a game of cat and mouse.

title: Karwaan
cast: Irrfan Khan, Dulquer Salmaan, Mithila Palkar
description: An IT professional, who is unhappy with his job, embarks on an unexpected road trip with his quirky friend and a college student after a mix-up with dead bodies.

title: Fanney Khan
cast: Anil Kapoor, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Rajkummar Rao, Pihu Sand
description: A father goes to extreme lengths to fulfill his daughter's dream of becoming a singing sensation. He kidnaps a famous pop star to get his daughter a chance to perform.

title: Mulk
cast: Rishi Kapoor, Taapsee Pannu, Prateik Babbar, Rajat Kapoor
description: A Muslim family in a small town in India has to fight for their honor after their son is accused of being a terrorist. The film explores themes of prejudice and patriotism.

title: Dhadak
cast: Janhvi Kapoor, Ishaan Khatter, Ashutosh Rana
description: A young couple from different castes fall in love, but their relationship is opposed by their families. They elope to build a new life together, but their happiness is short-lived.

title: Soorma
cast: Diljit Dosanjh, Taapsee Pannu, Angad Bedi, Vijay Raaz
description: The inspiring true story of hockey player Sandeep Singh, who made a comeback to the sport after being accidentally shot and paralyzed.

title: Veere Di Wedding
cast: Kareena Kapoor Khan, Sonam Kapoor, Swara Bhaskar, Shikha Talsania, Sumeet Vyas
description: Four female friends navigate the challenges of love, life, and marriage in contemporary Delhi. The film celebrates female friendship and challenges societal norms.

title: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
cast: John Abraham, Diana Penty, Boman Irani, Anuja Sathe
description: Based on the true story of the nuclear bomb test explosions conducted by the Indian Army at Pokhran in 1998. The film follows the team that made the mission a success.

title: Raazi
cast: Alia Bhatt, Vicky Kaushal, Jaideep Ahlawat, Rajit Kapur, Shishir Sharma
description: In 1971, a young Indian woman is married off to a Pakistani army officer to spy for her country during the Indo-Pakistani War. She must walk a tightrope between her duty and her emotions.

title: 102 Not Out
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Rishi Kapoor, Jimit Trivedi
description: A 102-year-old man tries to break the world record for the oldest living person. To do so, he must get rid of his grumpy 75-year-old son, so he threatens to send him to an old age home.

title: October
cast: Varun Dhawan, Banita Sandhu, Gitanjali Rao
description: A hotel management trainee's life is changed when his colleague has a tragic accident. He becomes obsessed with her recovery, leading to a journey of love, loss, and self-discovery.

title: Baaghi 2
cast: Tiger Shroff, Disha Patani, Manoj Bajpayee, Randeep Hooda, Prateik Babbar
